thread.title: Letter: Full support for Harrison Judge Marc Lust
thread.title_full: Letter: Full support for Harrison Judge Marc Lust

title: Letter: Full support for Harrison Judge Marc Lust
text:
Letter: Full support for Harrison Judge Marc Lust The Journal News 1:08 p.m. EDT October 24, 2015 Marc Lust 1 CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
I support and endorse Judge Marc Lust who has served our community as Harrison town justice for the past 16 years. 
I have known Judge Lust for nearly 30 years. In that time, he has devoted himself to the well-being of Harrison, participating in many community activities, including years as a coach in our recreational youth programs. He is intelligent, has the highest integrity, and someone I am proud to call my friend. 
Judge Lust is known for his strong sense of fairness and the professional way he runs his court, treating everyone with dignity and respect. He is also a past president of the Westchester County Magistrates Association. 
With Judge Lustâ€™s leadership, our Town Court has earned an outstanding reputation for dispensing fair justice. 
And, the Harrison police know who to turn to when they need to get their job done. Whether to issue a search warrant or to get out of bed to conduct an arraignment, Judge Lust is the person the Harrison police turn to for assistance. 
In recent weeks, some negative comments have circulated regarding Judge Lust, based on unsubstantiated allegations, and it is important to remember sometimes things aren't always how they appear. 
Let's not lose sight of what Judge Lust has done for our community these past 16 years. The goal is to elect the most qualified candidate and that makes our choice on Election Day an easy one. 
Vote for Judge Lust on Nov. 3, so he can continue to serve our community. 
Martin Rogowsky
